messages.content: "For the last nine years our City has been badly let down by this Government and we haven't had a strong voice standing up for Carlisle. A vote for me on December 12 can change things."

community.content: 203 of 309 schools in Cumbria have suffered cuts to per-pupil funding. I am seriously concerned about the impact of these funding cuts on our local schools and the most vulnerable pupils. Now more than ever, Carlisle needs an MP who has a strong record of standing up against cuts, to be our MP.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived in Carlisle with my husband for over ten years. We have two daughters, who were both born and bred here. I know this city as both a teacher and parent. You deserve an MP who is someone with passion and commitment to stand up for schools, public services, and local community. I'm the teacher, the NHS nurse's daughter, and local mum who will do just that.

personalStories.story: As a teacher, I am seriously concerned about the impact of these funding cuts on our local schools and the most vulnerable pupils. Now more than ever, Carlisle needs an MP who has a strong record of standing up against cuts, to be our MP.

As a student nurse I know the difference having access to public services can make on our local communities. Under-funding resources and under-resourced staff lead to hardship and strain on the NHS system.

As an NHS professional I see the enormous impact well-funded services can make. Ruth cares and has a vested interest in this community because she lives here. She is a compassionate advocate for local services. Our NHS can't face any more cuts and Ruth has the drive to make positive changes to better local health services.

examples: "For the last nine years our City has been badly let down by this Government and we haven't had a strong voice standing up for Carlisle. A vote for me on December 12 can change things."
